subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: CHICAGO, Aug. 3 — The long, strange trip of Kerry Wood has again reached Wrigley Field. Before Friday’ 6-2 loss to the Mets, the Cubs activated Wood, who has not pitched in the major leagues since June 6, 2006, because of the shoulder problems that have bothered him since the start of 2005. Wood has had 11 stays on the disabled list and two major surgeries.
